Description:
Your next project.
An ideal opportunity for those in search of their next project or development in the booming suburb of Corio offering a magnificent 697m2 (approx.) allotment with a three bedroom home that's currently tenanted for $240pw. Offering a wide side driveway, forward positioned home and extensive rear yard this property is ideal for those looking to potentially sub-divide and construct an additional dwelling in the rear (STCA) or hold as an addition to your investment portfolio. Comprising of three bedrooms in total, comfortable lounge, central bathroom and kitchen with meals area. The large rear yard provides the new owners the chance to transform this prime piece of land into a future development site (STCA) otherwise leave as is and hold for future growth. Overlooking the Princes Highway set behind a slip lane the home provides easy access to the Corio Shopping Centre, Primary Schools and child care facilities make this home easily accessible to most major amenities.
Photo ID Required
Insights: 279 Princes Highway, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Live in or re-develop, you choose.
Embrace the opportunity of creating something really special - you could consider moving in straight away, pursue a modern refurbishment to the existing home or develop as residential (STCA). The home itself consists of three good sized bedrooms close by the central bathroom. The sun filled living space with gas heating and floorboards leads to the separate kitchen that provides gas cooking and dining area. Let your imagination run wild with ample room in the rear yard to potentially sub-divide in the future (STCA). Off street parking is available in the single carport or SLUG. Nestled in an established neighbourhood within walking distance to multiple reserves, primary schools as well as the Corio Shopping Centre. With everything so easily accessible and a large allotment of land offering so many potential uses this is definitely an opportunity not to be missed. Don't delay, enquire today.
Insights: 26 Canadian Parade, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Unique opportunity in prime location.
A large family home that will impress you as soon as you walk through the front door. Immaculately presented inside and out, if you are looking for a home where you can entertain and impress friends and family, then this home must be inspected. Stepping through the grand entrance you're greeted by the central dining area complimented by the modern kitchen with island bench, stainless steel appliances, gas cook top and dishwasher. Offering two spacious lounge areas in total with heater and split system air-conditioner for year round comfort. The three bedrooms in the main residence, all containing built in robes, are situated adjacent the family bathroom.
A beautifully renovated self-contained bungalow in the rear yard provides an additional fourth bedroom as well as generous open planned lounge with kitchen and bathroom. The backyard provides a large undercover alfresco area, separate gazebo, garden shed, single carport and still plenty of room for the kids or pets to enjoy. Positioned in a brilliant location moments away from local shopping, schools and public transport, plus easy freeway access. This property is a must see and won't disappoint.
Insights: 8 Pembroke Street, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
An outstanding find.
This beautifully presented three bedroom home is an outstanding find, offering purchasers the chance to secure an immaculately updated property ready to move straight into or rent out situated on a grand 523m2 (approx.) allotment. Showcasing a spacious & light filled lounge area and meals zone with an adjoining kitchen complete with gas cooking, stainless steel oven and ample counter space. The three bedrooms are well size with BIR's, while the central bathroom has a separate shower to bath, a separate toilet and laundry with external access. A paved undercover alfresco overlooks the large rear yard which contains SLUG and an additional single carport for off street parking. This exceptional home is made complete by its prime location, only moments to the Geelong Ring Road, multiple reserves, public transport, Northern Bay College - Goldsworthy Road campus and the Corio Shopping Centre. A personal inspection is a must to see the warmth and extraordinary value this property has to offer.
Insights: 4 Cobham Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Fantastic location on a 637m2 block approx.
This delightful brick veneer home offers purchasers a chance to secure a 3 bedroom home on a generous 637m2 approx. parcel of land in a great location within walking distance to the Corio shopping centre and just a 10 minute drive to the Geelong CBD. This house offers a spacious living room upon entry which flows through to the neat and tidy kitchen and adjoining meals area. The original floor boards lead down the central hallway where you will find the 3 bedrooms (2 carpeted). The home is serviced by a central bathroom with separate toilet and laundry which opens out to the large grassed rear yard boasting single garage and garden shed.

Description:
Second Chance! 325m2 STAGE 1 Allotment in Family-Focused, ‘Flinders Park Estate’
Phone Enquiry ID: 54687
Welcome home to Compass Circuit in ‘Flinders Park Estate’ - Corio’s exciting, newest development, positioned for absolute convenience, just moments from Corio Central shopping, schools, sporting facilities, medical services, and the ring road - linking you with Melbourne CBD, the surf coast and everywhere between with ease.
Lot 15, a 325sqm (approx) parcel within the fast sell-out Stage 1A of the estate and is due to be titled in May 2018.
Level and clear, with a 12.5m street frontage and a 26m depth (approx) there are plenty of options to incorporate the design and layout that you want. Fully serviced, the block will have all services and utilities available including; High-speed broadband, NBN, Pay TV, natural gas, underground power, sewer & telephone.
An exciting opportunity for first home buyers, young and growing families to become part of a popular neighbourhood and build your dream family home - with the added bonus of having no time restrictions on when or if you decide to build, so you can buy now and keep saving to build; and very few building/design restrictions so you can create the look you want.
Corio is in the heart of Geelong’s thriving ‘northern growth corridor’, consistently generating excellent rental returns, strong yields and growth, so it’s a rewarding opportunity for investors too.
If you missed out the first time, you now have a second chance to purchase an allotment in the estate’s best positioned release, with picturesque lakelands, open green spaces, a children’s playground and BBQ area located just a few doors away, as well as modern street lighting and avenues of trees.
Insights: 15 Compass Circuit, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
Ideal Investment with Development Opportunity (STCA)
Presenting an exciting opportunity in a high growth locale, this neat property is ideally suited for those looking to enter the market or expand their investment portfolio. Offering a generous land component of 771 m2 (approx.) providing plenty of scope for future development (STCA).
Featuring three bedrooms all with built in robes with the second living space also lending itself as a fourth bedroom if you so desire. The open plan kitchen, living and dining area have been tastefully updated and opened up to allow for functional daily living.
Outside offers an undercover deck, allowing for all year round entertaining. Further to this a spacious yard perfect for the kids and pets.
Includes:
- Double lock up garage
- Split system heating and cooling
- Gas heater
Located only minutes away from the Corio Shopping Village, local schools and sporting facilities plus quick access to the ring road all combining to further underpin your investment.
Insights: 3 Clive Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
"Stunning Renovated Family Home"
A beautifully renovated family home in a sought after location, take advantage of what 24 Paley Drive has to offer. With quality fittings and fixtures throughout, 2 living areas, 3 bedrooms, an updated central kitchen & bathroom, 2 outdoor entertaining areas for all-year-round entertaining, a single carport and a single Colorbond garage at the rear with drive-thru access to the yard. Situated on a corner block only minutes from Corio Central Shopping complex, schools/kindergartens, medical facilities and more. With public transport at your doorstep plus quick and easy access to the Geelong Ring Rd for Melbourne (45 mins) & Surf Coast (25 mins) commuting and Princes Hwy go get you to the Geelong CBD in 10-15 minutes. This property will not last long!
-Stunning Renovated Family Home
-Quality Appliances and Updated Throughout
-Walking distance to schools, shops & public transport
-Minutes to Geelong Ring Road for Melbourne/Surf Coast commuting
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:

Situated on a huge 764sqm block (approx), take advantage of this spectacular opportunity to secure a large updated family home with all of the added extras. Only minutes from Corio Homemaker Centre, Aldi Shopping Centre, schools, medical facilities and more.
Consisting of 4 good-sized bedrooms, an updated central kitchen/dining/living area, 2 bathrooms, double garage. With quick and easy access to the Geelong Ring Rd for Melbourne (45 mins) & Surf Coast (25 mins) commuting and Princes Hwy go get you to the Geelong CBD in 10-15 minutes.
Stunning Family Home
Large 764sqm Block (Approx.)
Walking distance to schools, shops & public transport
Minutes to Geelong Ring Road for Melbourne/Surf Coast commuting

Description:
Beautifully Renovated Family Home on a Large Block
Situated on a large 626sqm Block (approx) is this immaculately presented family home. Recently completely renovated with quality fixtures and fittings, take advantage of this move-in and unpack delight with all of the added extras. With large living zones and large bedrooms, this home stands out from the rest. Boasting 3 bedrooms, all with built in robes, large lounge/living area, beautifully updated kitchen and bathroom plus an all-weather outdoor entertaining area for all-year-round entertaining. An established private ear-yard plus a single lock up garage completes this package located within walking distance to schools, shops, public transport & only a few minutes from the Geelong Ring Rd & Princes Hwy for Melbourne/Surf Coast/Geelong commuting. Priced to sell this property will not last long!

Description:
Look no further.
Boasting prime position on the main road of Corio this charming home that has been renovated inside and out provides buyers a chance to secure a set and forget investment in a brilliant location. Don't miss your chance to view this wonderful home or investment that presents plenty of appeal for the Melbourne commuter with the Princes Highway close by. Comprising of a generous lounge upon entry and boasting polished floorboards adjacent to the dining area that leads to the immaculate kitchen.
Complete with
three sizeable bedrooms and a neat central bathroom providing separate shower and bath. The rear yard is a blank canvas offering long driveway ideal for off street parking and ample room still left to entertain family and friends. Located within easy reach to all major amenities such as the Corio Shopping Centre, medical facilities, Geelong Ring Road and the Northern Bay College - Goldsworthy Road campus just around the corner what more could you want? Currently tenanted for $270 pw this picture perfect home could be exactly what you've been waiting for.

Description:
Renovated brick veneer home.
Set across an outstanding allotment of approximately 572m2, this brick veneer classic is the perfect choice for growing families seeking a home with exceptional space & packed with future potential or the astute investor who wants to capitalize in the popular suburb of Corio. The home has been extensively renovated to create a finished product that is modern, low maintenance, aesthetically appealing and functional for every day family life. Move-in ready yet with ample scope to add your own updates over time. The property includes 4 bedrooms in total located close by to the gleaming central bathroom. Two sun-filled lounge areas and a dedicated dining zone provide plenty of space for family living, while the sizeable kitchen in the heart of the home is neat as a pin with plenty of cupboard space and stainless steel appliances. Boasting 22 solar panels, ducted heating and reverse cycle A/C this charming home is full of extras to provide the new owner an easy and convenient lifestyle. Perfectly located just a short stroll to Goldsworthy Reserve, Northern Bay College Campuses and Corio Shopping Centre. This property should definitely be on top of your inspection list, call today before it's too late.
Insights: 35 Colorado Drive, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
One of a kind.
Impressive in size, versatility and seamless indoor-outdoor entertaining, this masterfully renovated four bedroom residence, set in beautifully landscaped low maintenance gardens offers the finest modern amenities within a framework of sophisticated elegance. Boasting large light filled interiors the home comprises of 2 spacious lounge areas ideal for large families, as well as 4 generous bedrooms with BIR's (Master with WIR). Centrally located the impressive main bathroom comes complete with the ultimate shower containing built in music speakers and lights. The tailored kitchen is born to meet the most demanding needs. Innovative, luxurious and functional the kitchen is equipped with a 900mm oven and breakfast bar overlooking the meals area. Step outside into your own private sanctuary, the elaborate deck and exposed concrete alfresco will no doubt impress all buyers. Packed full of features such as the stunning built in wood oven with custom made cabinetry, 4000L aquarium, outdoor shower (with plumbing equipped for the new owners to potentially install a spa) as well as roller shutters meaning year round entertaining opportunities. If that wasn't enough living space an additional man cave is available in the extensive shed at the rear of the property featuring wood fire, bar and separate W/C. Off street parking is assured in the DLUG and large driveway, securely locked behind the grand automatic front gates. Offering additional extras such as evaporative cooling, ducted heating and much more this home has been thoroughly renovated to ensure a comfortable and easy lifestyle. Nestled in an established neighbourhood surrounded by multiple reserves all major amenities are within easy reach. Close by to the Shell Reserve, child care facilities, primary schools and not even a 2 minute drive to the Corio Shopping Centre and Princes Highway. For commuters what more could you want? Inspections are a must to truly appreciate all the detail this stunning property offers. Don't hesitate, secure this remarkable family home today.
Insights: 11 Rimula Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Hidden delight.
Prime positioning in a quiet neighbourhood, take advantage of this incredible opportunity to purchase this 3 bedroom home sitting on a generous 600m2 approx. parcel of land. This extremely convenient location will be sure to please, if you are a first home owner or an astute investor, this is the perfect opportunity. Offering a large living area which opens into the kitchen and meals area, three generous bedrooms, central bathroom as well as separate laundry and w/c. The rear yard itself offers an abundance of space perfect to entertain friends and family with a double car garage. Complete with wide side drive-way and large rear yard the property offers the potential to subdivide and construct additional dwelling at the rear (STCA). Just a short stroll to the Corio Shopping Centre, sporting facilities, multiple schools and reserves, all major amenities are within easy reach. Currently tenanted for $250pw, don't miss the opportunity to inspect!
** Please note the photos advertised are from the previous sale of the home in 2017 - Please call to book an inspection of the current property.

Description:
One of a kind.
Welcoming this beautifully presented 3 bedroom home which welcomes you the minute you enter. Comprising of 3 spacious bedrooms with polished floors, central tiled bathroom with shower, comfortable lounge upon entry, this is a home too good to miss. The rear yard offers purchasers a chance to veg out and relax on the decking under the pergola whilst enjoying the company of family and friends. Positioned in a quiet street location away from the busy highway, close to local supermarkets, shops, sporting facilities and train stations, what is there not to like about this home? Don't miss your chance to buy today!

Description:
What a Find!
Positioned on an amazing corner location within walking distance of schools, shops and recreational facilities, this single-storey family home is beautifully updated throughout. Complemented by high ceilings, security doors and ceiling fans, it comprises 3 bedrooms with built-in-robes and lovely bathroom with modern hardware. The kitchen overlooks the dining/meals area and provides upright gas stove/oven, glass splashback and breakfast bench. Dark cabinetry adds a touch of contrast to the space, while an impressively-sized lounge room features custom bar. Additional enhancements include heating/cooling, freshly painted interior, new carpets, curtains, interior and exterior blinds. Storage options are catered for with double garage and side access for caravan or boat. A great property at a great price, with potential for future development!
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
You'll Miss Out If You Think Twice
Situated in the RGZ 2 this neat and tidy family home is in great location. Taking advantage of the great location and close proximity to all amenities including the Princes Highway the home has gas ducted heating and consists of three good sized bedrooms large lounge, neat and tidy kitchen joining to a meals area, central bathroom with 2nd toilet, garage and best of all a large entertainment area. Perfectly situated in a convenient location only minutes from Corio Shopping Centre, Princes Hwy, quality schools for all ages and much more, this home is sure to tick all your boxes. Inspections are a must!
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Beautifully Presented Family Home in Sought After Location
This beautifully presented brick veneer home offers vast opportunity to investors, first home buyers and growing families alike. Boasting 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom & an open plan living/meals/kitchen area, double garage and double carport all set on a generous allotment located within walking distance to schools, shops and public transport. Set in a popular and sought after street only 10 minutes' drive to Geelong CBD & only a few minutes from the Geelong Ring Rd for Melbourne & Surf-Coast commuters. This property will not last long!
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Great Location
This charming red brick home is sure to tick all the boxes. The home features 3 bedrooms, a spacious open plan lounge with gas heating, updated kitchen with room for a dining table, a central bathroom, and car carport as well as a single car garage. Other features include private front yard, Tas oak hardwood timber floors under the carpet. Situated in a convenient court location opposite to park opposite Corio Shopping centre, close to medical clinics, schools and lots more. The home represents excellent value and is an ideal property to add to your portfolio. Call now to arrange your inspection!
